response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value to us and has the potential to significantly impact your business. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it's worth more than $1,500,000 to you. However, considering our strategic objectives and the current market conditions, I am extending an exclusive offer to acquire this product at a special price of $1,200,000. This represents a substantial saving of $300,000 compared to its perceived value, making it a highly attractive proposition for you. We are confident that this investment will yield significant returns for you and aligns well with your business goals. I look forward to discussing the details and exploring how we can make this opportunity mutually beneficial. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product.", "product_price": 1200000}
